name: Collegium
description: An event reminder dashboard application for college events.
long_description: An application that allows users to create,view and register into events.Event creation form is markdown supported, users can view the upcoming events as well as the events that they have registered into. The application is designed to be used by college students and faculty.

name: IIIT-Bh Placement Website
description: Official website for IIIT-Bh Placement Cell.
long_description: This website is designed to provide students with information about the placement process at IIIT-Bh. This website parses data from excel sheets and provides students with a better visualization of the data.

name: Antinormie Discord Bot
description: A Discord bot for the Antinormie Discord server.
long_description: This bot is designed to provide upcoming competitive coding contests on Codeforces and Codechef. It can generate random leetcode problems, create coding rooms on binarysearch.com, tell jokes, and tell random funny dialogues.

name: SpaceBar
description: A typing game for the web.
long_description: Oh no! Pacman has attacked! As the ships Captain, you must stop Pacman's beam of words from destroying your ship by your typing skills. Let's see how fast you can roll those fingers!

name: Social Media UI
description: A social media UI for the user to interact with the social media platform.
long_description: This is a blockchain based social media UI, made as a hackathon submission.

name: Old Portfolio Website
long_description: This is the website that I used to host as my portfolio. Styled as an OS, it is a bit of a mess and unresponsive, but it was my first portfolio and fun project to work on. I hope you enjoy it!

name: Customer Management System
long_description: This is a CMS cum E-commerce website. It is a django application that allows the user to manage their account, track their orders, view and order products from the store. I implemented role based access control, user authentication and user management.

name: Animations using Framer-motion
description: A website that uses framer-motion to animate the elements.( Not responsive yet )
long_description: Tried to replicate a mockup of a website from Dribbble using framer-motion. The website is not responsive yet, but it is a fun project to work on.
